doc.field: There is one large folder of correspondence, late 1940s-1980s; the rest of the box contains writings, published and unpublished, and related correspondence. Topics include Marxist theory and tactics, Lenin, Mao Zedong, Enver Hoxha, and sociobiology.

There is one large folder of correspondence, late 1940s-1980s; the rest of the box contains writings, published and unpublished, and related correspondence. Topics include Marxist theory and tactics, Lenin, Mao Zedong, Enver Hoxha, and sociobiology.

Series IV, Miscellaneous Unprocessed Materials. >> There is one large folder of correspondence, late 1940s-1980s; the rest of the box contains writings, published and unpublished, and related correspondence. Topics include Marxist theory and tactics, Lenin, Mao Zedong, Enver Hoxha, and sociobiology.
